A: Did you know Hector plays the piano?

B: ((He loves that sort of thing)) all the time.
((Are you supposed to be looking as if)) you're ((enjoying yourself))?

A: He speaks very good English. Did he live in any English-speaking country for a long time?

B: ((Not that I know of)).
You want to know more about it? OK, ((I'll tell you how it will work)).
((Hey, it's been a long time)). ((Boy, am I glad to see you)).
((Did anyone call me while I was gone))?
((The rumour disappeared soon afterwards and has not been heard of since)).

David, you are teaching English for Specific Purposes or ESP at the moment. 
((Could you start by telling us what it is))?

No opportunity for Mize (to) even get a chance ((to field that ball)). He was just trying to get out of the way. That’s a good balance right back up the middle for Shohei Ohtani. ((What a swing that was)).
((up in the mountain))

Yes, I have ((tricks in my pocket)), I have ((things up my sleeve)). But I am ((the opposite of a stage magician)). ((He gives you illusion that has the appearance of truth)). I give you truth ((in the pleasant disguise of illusion)).
I ((no sooner get in the door than you give me a dozen petty little duties)) to perform.
She's such a sloppy woman. ((She was still in her housecoat at eleven)) this morning.
No. ((It's too much work to put everything up and then take it down again)) every night.
((Be one of the first to observe what is sure to be one of)) the fastest growing technologies.
((Your best bet is to attend the class anyway)).
I lean against the chest-high chain link fence and make a brief survey of the yard. ((Just the sort of yard a cat would love)), ((but hope as I might)), ((nothing catty puts in an appearance)).
((It's just a matter of showing what I'm capable of)).
((Whatever it is, it's terrible||Whatever it is is terrible)).
((I wonder where he's wandered)).
((I wandered around so I won't wonder any more)).
((He laughs best who laughs last)).

A: You look handsome.
B: Hey, do you really think so?
A: ((In your own way, that is)).
We ((are dealing with an epidemic the likes of which)) we ((have never seen in this century)).
((What do you)) think ((is the best weapon to use against)) an ((enemy who)) you’re (( not even exactly sure what it is))?
((Someone keyed my car)) for ((no reason)). ((Do you have any)) idea ((who might've done it))?
((I had)) an ((amazing night's sleep)). ((I woke up at)) four, ((and I was raring to go)).
((My dad had a sweet tooth)). ((It kind of brushed off on me)).
((It hasn't worked out)) the ((way I hoped it would)).
((It is easy to be lulled into)) a ((false sense of security)).
This thing ((clearly died a long time ago)), so ((let's not put it at the top of our list of worries)).
Stop ((acting like that)). ((Why don't you give me)) a ((nice smile and say hi for)) a ((change))?
